/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the highway, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their silhouettes faint against the bright sky. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of man-made structures and natural beauty.
